email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for 5000MT of wheat from Houston to Hamburg on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the PACIFIC STAR, with a DWT of 65000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD45 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD42 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Houston on 1st October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Hamburg
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight
